mapper.insert: insert into db_muliproduct (ID, MLSKU, MABANGSKU, PRODUCTNAME, OPENFLAG, WEIGHT, 'LENGTH', WIDTH, HEIGHT, PRICE, STOCK, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mlsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mabangsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{length,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{width,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_muliproduct set MLSKU = #{mlsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MABANGSKU = #{mabangsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'LENGTH' = #{length,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WIDTH = #{width,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HEIGHT = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STOCK = #{stock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, MLSKU, MABANGSKU, PRODUCTNAME, OPENFLAG, WEIGHT, 'LENGTH', WIDTH, HEIGHT, PRICE, STOCK, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3 from db_muliproduct where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ID, MLSKU, MABANGSKU, PRODUCTNAME, OPENFLAG, WEIGHT, 'LENGTH', WIDTH, HEIGHT, PRICE, STOCK, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3 from db_muliproduct
